content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #282

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 76

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Providing FHIR Resources to a CDS Service
Section: Prefetch Template
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

If the EHR has no data to populate a template prefetch key, the prefetch template key MUST have a value of null.

Comment:
What is the expected result if the prefetch is a search query that the EHR supports, but has 0 results? Does the existing wording mean the result should be null (rather than a bundle w/ 0 entries)? Please clarify in spec - as I expected a 0-result bundle would be appropriate to indicate the search succeeded but had 0 results..

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #282

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 76

Section: Prefetch Template
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

If the EHR has no data to populate a template prefetch key, the prefetch template key MUST have a value of null.

Comment:
What is the expected result if the prefetch is a search query that the EHR supports, but has 0 results? Does the existing wording mean the result should be null (rather than a bundle w/ 0 entries)? Please clarify in spec - as I expected a 0-result bundle would be appropriate to indicate the search succeeded but had 0 results..

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #282

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Will resolve with ballot comment 37

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #282

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
Will resolve with ballot comment 37

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
